text: anathara (anatha hennu makkala) visayadalli n'yaya palisalu nimage sadhyavagadu emba bhaya nimagiddare (itara) mahileyara paiki nimagistaviruva ibbaru, muvaru athava nalvarannu vivahavagiri. Innu (patniyara visayadalli) n'yaya palisalu sadhyavagadu emba bhaya nimagiddare obbale patniyalli athava nim'ma malakatvadalliruva dasiyalli (trpti padiri). (Nim'minda) yavude atireka sambhavisade iruvudakke idu heccu sahayakavagide
